nodes.text: Fun fact: fintech thinks deregulation = racial justice. This is false & especially harmful to have an industry insider advocating for this in such a powerful position.
@vasoods Wait a second... That's not a fun fact at all!

My old members who worked at Walmart received regular advertising from payday lenders AND payday advance apps looking to make a buck off ppl making $11/hr. Our govt is so behind on regulating existing and emerging financial instruments that prey on regular folks.
We don’t need another relic of the past, but a strong and sharp advocate who isn’t afraid to take on the worst predators. \nAlso read Mehrsa’s book! https://t.co/P8inqJPB0k

Biden campaigned on reducing # racial wealth gap & could A) regulate banks who are a perpetrator of the problem and B) select the leading expert to head OCC but instead will C) choose the white guy w ties to fin tech??? 🧐🧐🧐 https://t.co/6AX3PG4tpW
